mapper.select: select te_num,te_name,te_set,te_reps,te_tool from type_of_exercise where te_num = #{teNum}
mapper.insert: insert into trainer_profile (apply_num, username, name, sex, career, apply_date, file, up_filename) values((select ifnull(max(b.apply_num) + 1,1) from trainer_profile b),#{username},#{name},#{sex},#{career}, NOW(), #{file}, #{upFilename})
mapper.select: select * from trainer_profile where trainer_apply = "N" and delete_apply = "N"
mapper.update: update user set authority = 'trainer' where username = #{username}
update trainer_profile set trainer_apply = 'Y' where username = #{username}
update trainer_profile set delete_apply = 'Y' where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, authority) values(#{username}, #{password},"user")
insert into exercise_title(Exercise_code,Exercise_name) values((select ifnull(max(exercise_code),0) from exercise_item),#{ExerciseName})
mapper.select: select distinct ei.Exercise_code,ei.exercise_date as start,ei.title, ei.userWeight, et.Exercise_name, ec.Exercise_set, ec.Exercise_reps, ec.Exercise_lb from exercise_item ei, exercise_title et, exercise_contents ec where ei.Exercise_code=et.Exercise_code and et.Exercise_title_code=ec.Exercise_title_code and id = #{id}

select et.Exercise_name,ec.Exercise_contents_code, ec.Exercise_set,ec.Exercise_reps,ec.Exercise_lb from exercise_title et join exercise_contents ec on et.Exercise_title_code = ec.Exercise_title_code where et.Exercise_code = #{exerciseCode}

select et.Exercise_name,ec.Exercise_contents_code, ec.Exercise_set,ec.Exercise_reps,ec.Exercise_lb from exercise_title et join exercise_contents ec on et.Exercise_title_code = ec.Exercise_title_code where et.Exercise_code = #{exerciseCode}
select count(*) from user where username=#{username}
select count(*) from user where username=#{username} and password=#{password}

SELECT user.username,point,count(user_management.manager) menti,ROUND(((user.point + count(user_management.manager) * 100) / 100 + (user.score * 10)),1) rank FROM user,user_management WHERE authority = 'trainer' AND user_management.manager = user.username AND user_management.reading = 'Y' GROUP BY user_management.manager ORDER BY rank DESC LIMIT 10
